document.full_text: an open stretch of warm, dry weather in the eastern corn belt this week is raising farmers' hopes they will be able to catch up on crop planting after a wet, chilly spring, a forecaster said on wednesday.
document.title: eastern corn belt farmers race to plant as clouds clear
lines_and_colors: an open stretch of warm, dry weather in the eastern corn belt this week is raising farmers' hopes they will be able to catch up on crop planting after a wet, chilly spring, a forecaster said on wednesday.
